extensionName.description: The name of this add-on; should be English if possible.

tooltipCertNone.description: Tooltip shown when no relevant connection was inspected in this tab yet.

tooltipCertStored.description: Tooltip shown when all certificates match the stored ones.

tooltipCertTofu.description: Tooltip shown when at least one new certificate was added to the store automatically.

tooltipCertChanged.message: Zertifikat unterscheidet sich von gespeicherter Version
tooltipCertChanged.description: Tooltip shown when at least one certificate differs from the stored one.

tooltipCertError.description: Tooltip shown when an internal error occured during certificate checking.

tooltipDisabled.description: Tooltip shown when the add-on is temporarily disabled.

settingsLblCheckCerts.description: Label for the selection of which kind of connections should be checked.

settingsCheckCertsTooltip.description: Tooltip for the selection of which kind of connections should be checked.

settingsCheckDomainCert.message: Prüfe nur Zertifikate für die Domain in der Tab URL
settingsCheckDomainCert.description: Setting to check only certificates of the page domain (the domain in the URL bar).

settingsLblLogLevel.description: Label for the selection of the log level (debugging informatin in the browser console).

settingsLogLevelTooltip.message: Meldungen in der Browser-Konsole können helfen, Fehler in diesem Add-on zu finden.
settingsLogLevelTooltip.description: Tooltip for the setting of the log level.

settingsLogLevelNone.description: Setting to have no logging in the browser console.

settingsLogLevelInfo.description: Setting to have info-level logging in the browser console.

settingsLogLevelDebug.description: Setting to have debug-level logging in the browser console.

settingsLblIgnoredDomains.description: Label for the textbox to insert domains to ignore.

settingsIgnoredDomainsTooltip.message:
Eine ignorierte Domain pro Zeile
Für beliebigen Domain-Teil * benutzen
Z.B.: *.example.com
settingsIgnoredDomainsTooltip.description: Tooltip explaining the ignore domain textarea

settingsLblCheckedFields.description: Label for the list of fields that will be checked for modifications.

settingsCheckedFieldsTooltip.message:
Zertifikatsfelder die überprüft werden sollen
Zertifikate, die sich nur in ungeprüften Feldern unterscheiden, werden automatisch gespeichert
settingsCheckedFieldsTooltip.description: Tooltip for the list of fields that will be checked for modifications.

settingsLblCheckSubject.description: The label for the checkbox to check subject field for modifications

settingsLblCheckIssuer.description: The label for the checkbox to check issuer field for modifications

settingsLblCheckValidity.description: The label for the checkbox to check validity field for modifications

settingsLblCheckPublicKey.description: The label for the checkbox to check publicKey field for modifications

settingsLblCheckSerialNumber.description: The label for the checkbox to check serialNumber field for modifications

settingsLblCheckFingerprint.description: The label for the checkbox to check fingerprint field for modifications

settingsUserApprovalRequiredTooltip.description: The label for the checkbox to require user approval to continue

settingsSave.description: Button to save the modified settings.

settingsReset.description: Button to reset the modified settings.

popupTitle.description: Title for the pop-up page (usually not visible).

popupChangedCerts-single.description: The pop-up description for the displayed certificates that don't equal the stored version.

popupChangedCerts-many.description: The pop-up description for the displayed certificates that don't equal the stored version.

popupTofuCerts-single.description: The pop-up description for the displayed newly stored certificates.

popupTofuCerts-many.description: The pop-up description for the displayed newly stored certificates.

popupStoredCerts-single.description: The pop-up description for the displayed certificates that equal the stored version.

popupStoredCerts-many.description: The pop-up description for the displayed certificates that equal the stored version.

popupSettings.description: The link in the pop-up to the settings page.

popupSettingsTooltip.description: The tooltip for the link in the pop-up to the settings page.

popupStorage.description: The link in the pop-up to the storage page.

popupStorageTooltip.description: The tooltip for the link in the pop-up to the storage page.

popupChanged.description: Message signaling that the certificate field was changed.

popupChangedFieldSubject.description: The subject field in the certificate.

popupChangedFieldIssuer.description: The issuer field in the certificate.

popupChangedFieldValidity.description: The validity field in the certificate.

popupChangedFieldPublicKey.description: The public key in the certificate.

popupChangedFieldSerialNumber.description: The serial number of the certificate.

popupChangedFieldValidityStart.description: The starting time (Not Before field) of a certifcate shown in the comparison pop-up.

popupChangedFieldValidityEnd.description: The ending time (Not After field) of a certifcate shown in the comparison pop-up.

popupChangedStored.description: Label in front of the stored version of a changed field.

popupChangedNew.description: Label in front of the new version of a changed field.

popupAddChanged.description: Label of the button to store the new version of the certificate.

popupAddedChanged.description: Label of the button after the new certificate was stored.

popupStateEnabled.description: Signals that the add-on is currently active.

popupStateDisabled.description: Signals that the add-on is currently inactive.

popupStateEnabledTooltip.message: Klicken um Verbindungsüberprüfung temporär zu deaktivieren
popupStateEnabledTooltip.description: Tooltip for button to temporarily inactivate the connection checking.

popupStateDisabledTooltip.message: Klicken um Verbindungsüberprüfung wieder zu aktivieren
popupStateDisabledTooltip.description: Tooltip for button to re-activate the connection checking.

popupShowCertTooltip.description: Tooltip for link to show a host in storage

storageTitle.description: The title of the storage display page

storageNumStoredDomains-single.description: Describing the number of stored domains that comes directly in front of it.

storageNumStoredDomains-many.description: Describing the number of stored domains that comes directly in front of it.

storageSize.description: Describing the estimated size of the certificate storage.

storageRemoveHost.description: Remove a single host from storage.

storageRemoveAll.description: Button to clear the complete certifcate storage.

storageDaySelection.description: Input field and description to select number of days to clear.

storageRemoveAllConfirm.description: Confirmation question to really clear the full storage.

storageRemoveOldConfirm.message: Wirklich Zertifikate löschen, die $DAYS$ Tage lang nicht gesehen wurden?
storageRemoveOldConfirm.description: Confirmation question to really clear old (unseen) certificates.

storageRemoveExpiredConfirm.message: Wirklich Zertifikate löschen, die für $DAYS$ Tage abgelaufen sind?
storageRemoveExpiredConfirm.description: Confirmation question to really clear expired certificates.

storageFieldDomain.description: The table header for the domains.

storageFieldDomainFilter.description: Description for the filter by domain name.

storageFieldCert.description: The table header for the certificate.

storageFieldCertSubject.description: The table header for the certificate subject.

storageFieldCertIssuer.description: The table header for the certificate issuer.

storageFieldCertValidityStart.description: The table header for the certificate validity (start).

storageFieldCertValidityEnd.description: The table header for the certificate validity (end).

storageFieldCertLastSeen.description: The table header for the time when the certifcate was last encountered by this add-on.

storageCertUnknown.description: Used when displaying a certifcate and a value is not known (e.g. not stored).

timeDiffToday.description: Describes that something happens or happened today.

timeDiffBeforeToday-single.description: Describes that something happened a given number of days before today.

timeDiffBeforeToday-many.description: Describes that something happened a given number of days before today.

timeDiffAfterToday-single.description: Describes that something will happen a given number of days after today.

timeDiffAfterToday-many.description: Describes that something will happen a given number of days after today.
